page.title: 02GENERAL INTRODUCTION
page.content: THE EDUCATIONAL SYSTEM, THE DICKSON PLAN, WITH COMPREHENSIVE JUNIOR AND SENIOR HIGH SCHOOLS IS UNIQUE IN NORTHERN IRELAND. PORTADOWN IS A POPULAR SHOPPING CENTRE AND IN RECENT YEARS HAS BECOME IMPORTANT AS A TOURIST AREA WITH THE RIVER BANN AS THE FOCAL POINT. THE BANN IS IDEAL FOR FISHING COMPETITIONS, PLEASURE TRIPS AND ROWING REGATTAS. SHAMROCK PARK AND BROWNSTOWN PARK ARE THE MAIN SPORTS STADIA WHICH PROVIDE THE TOWN WITH FACILITIES FOR ATHLETICS, FOOTBALL AND STOCK CAR RACING THESE EVENTS AND ALL LOCAL NEWS ARE RECORDED IN THE AREA NEWSPAPER "THE PORTADOWN TIMES" WHICH WAS FOUNDED ALMOST 200 YEARS AGO.
